metadata.title: CVE-2017-15046 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
LAME 3.99.5, 3.99.4, 3.98.4, 3.98.2, 3.98 and 3.97 have a stack-based buffer overflow in unpack_read_samples in frontend/get_audio.c, a different vulnerability than CVE-2017-9412.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-15046` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lame - 3.100-2
libmp3lame0 - 3.100-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lame package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.100-2').
